titleStmt.title: The ingratitude of a common-wealth, or, The fall of Laius Martius Coriolanus as it is acted at the Theatre-Royal / by N. Tate.
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616. Coriolanus.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.M. for Joseph Hindmarsh ...,

notesStmt.note: First ed. of this alteration. Cf. DNB.
Originally planned to be included in the Variorum Coriolanus ... This ed. is limited to twenty-five copies.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
